faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Custom orders are typically delivered within 4 to 6 weeks depending on the complexity of the project.
faq.a2: Yes, we accept returns within 14 days of delivery for unworn items.
faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a3: We accept credit cards, mobile money, and bank transfers via Flutterwave.
faq.a4: Yes, we ship throughout West Africa and beyond. Shipping fees vary depending on the destination.
faq.q5: How do I take my measurements?
faq.a5: Check out our complete measurement guide on the custom order page. You can also send us your measurements via WhatsApp.
